data.title: Wyndham Championship: How to watch, preview, round 1 tee times, more
data.meta_description: How can fans tune into the Wyndham Championship  Open? Here is everything you need to know about the PGA Tour’s season finale.
data.text:
The PGA Tour is back for its regular season finale at the Wyndham Championship.

Lucas Glover, the defending champ, went on a roll last year at this event. Will he do it again in 2024? The field is stacked with players looking to improve their spots in the standings or simply get into that final Top 70 for the FedEx Cup.

After this event, the Top 70 head to Memphis for the St. Jude FedEx Cup Championship, the first of three playoff tournaments.

Here is the one-stop shop for how to tune into all 3M Open action.

Wyndham Championship Information:

Where: Sedgefield Country Club, Greensboro, N.C. (Par-70, 7,131 yards)

When: August 8-11th

Purse: $7,900,000 ($1,422,000 Winner)

FedEx Cup Points: 500

Defending Champion: Lucas Glover

How to Watch the Wyndham Championship

Golf Channel and CBS will share the television coverage of the Wyndham Championship. Below is the full schedule.

Thursday, Aug. 8:

3:00-6:00 p.m. ET (Golf Channel)

Friday, Aug. 9:

3:00-6:00 p.m. ET (Golf Channel)

Saturday, Aug. 10:

1-3 p.m. ET (Golf Channel)

3-6 p.m. E.T. (CBS)

Sunday, Aug. 11:

1-3 p.m. ET (Golf Channel)

3-6 p.m. E.T. (CBS)

How to Stream The Wyndham Championship

There are multiple ways to stream this week’s Wyndham Championship.

ESPN+ will air early coverage and feature groups all four days of play. Peacock will simultaneously stream the 3M Open throughout the week.

To stream coverage on Peacock, click here.

Paramount+ will also stream the CBS Sports coverage on Saturday and Sunday.
